LIST_STEPS.STEP_3: 每次登录MyWish时都要使用2FA代码

BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TITLE: 选择区块链
BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TEST_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: 付费前提供合约免费测试服务

CROWDSALE.TITLE: ICO合约
CROWDSALE.DESCRIPTION: 点击几下即可开始您的ICO /代币销售

TOKEN.TITLE: 代币合约
TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: 创建一个代币并自行或与代币销售合约一起分发

AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any ERC-20/ERC-223 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

EOS_AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
EOS_AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any EOS tokens among many accounts (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

INVESTMENT_POOL.TITLE: Investment pool
INVESTMENT_POOL.DESCRIPTION: The contract for ETH accumulation before the investment. Create it and share the address with others.

LOST_KEY.TITLE: 遗失私钥
LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: 智能合约与标准以太坊钱包具有完全相同的功能，此外，如果您遗失了访问权限/私钥，您的资金将被重新发送到备份钱包。

DEFERRED.TITLE: 延期付款
DEFERRED.DESCRIPTION: 智能合约在指定的日期付款。

WILL.TITLE: 遗嘱合约
WILL.DESCRIPTION: 设置在长时间不活动的情况下（死亡、事故等），将资金转账给家人或朋友。

WEDDING.TITLE: 婚约
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: 在指定时间段之后/期间在所有者之间分配资金的具有多重签名的钱包。

EOS_WALLET.TITLE: Create EOS Account
EOS_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: Create an account on EOS blockchain
EOS_WALLET.EOS_DESCRIPTION: For EOS account creation please go to the contracts.mywish.io

LIST.LIST_ITEM_1: 测试网中的合约可以免费使用（您可以在测试网创建并部署合约）
LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: 请接受低速部署（长达3小时）
LIST.LIST_ITEM_3: 测试网/主网中的合约代码相同
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: 处理合约时请使用测试网地址（Ropsten代表ETH）

LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_2: 选择遗嘱合约并进行设置， MyWish将生成您的个人智能合约。
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_3: 付款后，MyWish将合约部署到RSK网络。
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_4: 智能合约已部署并可随时执行。

LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_1: 用户定期调用合约以确认其"活跃"状态。
LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_2: 如果未在在指定的时间期限内确认，合约将资金分配给继承人。

EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.TITLE: 外部开发人员
EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.DESCRIPTION: 若你想要将合同添加到MyWish库并开始审计过程，请填写下面的表单。

MYWISH_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Send EOS to:
MYWISH_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You can send EOS tokens from an exchange or your EOS personal account. You can create account here: https://contracts.mywish.io/createAccount

MEMO_FIELD.LABEL: Fill MEMO field:
MEMO_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your unique code to MEMO field during the payment. It's unique for your account on MyWish platform.

NOTE.TEXT: 补充之后，您将无法转移/交易代币。 您只能将其用于平台内的合约创建

BTC_ATTENTION.TEXT:
您将在5 BTC块确认后收到代币。
交易时间大约为1小时。

LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: 选择钱包中的发送以太币&其他代币标签
LIST.LIST_ITEM_3: 插入以下收件人的地址：
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: 输入要发送的金额并选择ETH或WISH
LIST.LIST_ITEM_7: 点击“完成”按钮确认付款

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding accounts & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one account in EOS (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding addresses & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one address in Ethereum (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

TABLE.SUCCESS_ADDRESSES: The following addresses are ready to be whitelisted for Crowdsale contract:

ERRORS.WRONG_AMOUNT_FORMAT: Missed or wrong amount of tokens
ERRORS.WRONG_AMOUNT_VALUE: Wrong amount of tokens - decimals contradiction

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding whitelisted addresses you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one address in Ethereum format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_3: Only the first 100 addresses will be processed
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_4:
You can add as many addresses as you need, but not more than 100 at a time

TABLE.SUCCESS_ADDRESSES: The following addresses are ready to be whitelisted for Crowdsale contract:

MINT_TOKENS_FORM.DESCRIPTION: 为代币定义地址（完成铸币后代币将被发送到这个地址）

ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: 输入接收人的钱包地址
ADDRESS.LABEL: 地址
ADDRESS.EOS_DESCRIPTION: EOS account (not an exchange account). This account will receive the tokens

CHANGE_DATES_FORM.SET_NEW_DATES: 你可以变更开始和结束日期。 开始日期不得晚于销售日期且设有时间奖励的合约不得更改开始日期。

LESS_BALANCE.TEXT: 没有足够的代币来进行合约部署

FREEZE_DATE.TEXT:
代币的解冻日期已过期。
请更改并重试.

CONTRACT_START_DATE.TEXT:
合约的开始日期不正确。
请更改并重试.

LIST.ITEM_1: 您需要将代币所有权转移至ICO合约后才可激活代币发售。
LIST.ITEM_2: 您将需要从代币所有者地址进行特殊交易({{address}})

LIST.ITEM_0: 铸币结束后将不再进行铸币，，也不再创建新的ICO

LIST.ITEM_2: MyWish只负责在以太 / RSK网络上创建和启动合约
LIST.ITEM_3: MyWish不对因用户输入错误参数所导致的合约运行差错负责
LIST.ITEM_4: MyWish不对代码错误负责，但是如果检测到错误，它将尽一切可能消除错误
LIST.ITEM_5: MyWish无权访问合约的管理功能，且无法终止、继续该功能并进行其他操作，除非在截止日期之后才能完成。，

LIST.ITEM_1: 由于开发成本较高，您需在主网创建合约前联系 support@mywish.io

I_ALIVE.TITLE: 确认活跃状态
I_ALIVE.DESCRIPTION: 你确认你的状态是“活跃”吗

LIST.ITEM_0: 否则，资金将按照合约分配.
取消后所有资金将被发送到您的管理地址。
你确定要撤回吗？ 所有资金将被发送到您的管理地址。

ANY_TRANSACTION.PART_1: 从您的管理地址发送交易（{{amount||'0'}} ETH）
ANY_TRANSACTION.PART_GUEST: Send transaction ({{amount||'0'}} ETH) to contract address

ACTIVATE.TITLE: 激活
ACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: 要激活ICO合约，，您需要将代币所有权转移至ICO合约。 请从代币所有者地址调用相应的功能。

WHITELIST.TITLE: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION:
To add all addresses as whitelisted to Crowdsale contract please do the following transaction

AIRDROP.TITLE: Tokens sending
AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: To send tokens to addresses {{from}} - {{to}} please do the following steps (if you added many addresses it will take a lot of gas):

CANCEL.TITLE: 取消
CANCEL.DESCRIPTION: 要<span class="shadow-block__content__description__red uppercase">停止</ span>合约，请按照说明中的步骤操作。

DEPOSIT.TITLE: 存款
DEPOSIT.DESCRIPTION: 要在合约上存款，请按照说明进行。
DEPOSIT.AIRDROP_DESCRIPTION: To make a deposit of {{coinName}} tokens to Airdrop contract, please do the following steps:

LIST.ITEM_1: 打开你的钱包(Parity, MyEtherWallet)
LIST.ITEM_2: 选择钱包中的发送以太币&其他代币标签

FINALIZE.TITLE: 完成
FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: 请执行以下步骤完成合约并在（投资地址下）进行代币转账

I_ALIVE.TITLE: 确认活跃状态
I_ALIVE.DESCRIPTION: 请执行以下操作以确认您的活跃状态：

MINT.TITLE: 铸币
MINT.DESCRIPTION: 铸币{{amount}} {{tokenName}} tokens to {{recipient}} address please make the following transaction from token owner's address ({{admin}})

LIST.ITEM_2: 输入设置并点击合约复选框。

LIST.ITEM_4: 在"choose contract type"中选择"custom contracts".
LIST.ITEM_5: 在"network address"字段中，输入管理附加项（您的电子钱包地址）
LIST.ITEM_5_1: 指定合约的名称（建议使用您在MyWish服务中指定的名称)
LIST.ITEM_7: 现在这份合约已添加至合约，您可以从中转移资金。

WILL_CANCEL.TITLE: 取消
WILL_CANCEL.DESCRIPTION:
取消后，所有资金将发送到您的管理地址。
请执行以下操作取消：

WILL_WITHDRAW.DESCRIPTION:
撤回后，所有资金将发送到您的管理地址。
，请执行以下操作撤回：

CHANGE_DATES.DESCRIPTION: 变更开始日期为{{newStartDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}} / 完成日期为 {{newFinishDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}} 请执行以下步骤：

SEND_FUNDS.DESCRIPTION: For sending ({{amount}} ETH) to Destination address ({{address}}) please make the following steps:

GET_TOKENS.DESCRIPTION: For getting the tokens you need to make the transaction from your investment address:

SEND_TOKENS.DESCRIPTION: For sending the tokens (50 addresses per call) please make the following steps:

INVESTMENT_REFUND.DESCRIPTION: To refund your investments please make the following steps under your investment address:

DEPOSIT.TITLE: 存款
DEPOSIT.DESCRIPTION: 创建合约后，您需要向其发送资金。

LIST.ITEM_4: 如果您的BTC地址已被RSK社区列入白名单，您可以将SBTC发送至合约{{contract_address}} 真.

ENTER_PROMO_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: 您可以输入促销代码并获得折扣

WEDDING.TITLE: 婚约
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: 请填写下面的表格并说明您的意愿。 我们会在合约创建之前询问您的合作伙伴。

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: 管理地址
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: 该地址的所有者将拥有该合约（唯一的）的管理权

SEND_TO_WALLET.LABEL: 发送到钱包
SEND_TO_WALLET.PLACEHOLDER: 输入接收人的钱包地址
SEND_TO_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: 输入接收人的ETH地址。 该地址将作为转账接收地址。

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: 用于接收通知的电子邮箱
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: 输入能接收转账通知的电子邮箱地址。

DATE_OF_TRANSFER.LABEL: 转账日期
DATE_OF_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: 输入合约的条件 – 设定转账日期。

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address:
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Token
TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Specify the token which shall be distributed after the investment. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address:
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

HARD_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (maximum)
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines maximum volume for the pool. After reaching maximum no more contributions to pool are accepted.

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (minimum)
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines minimum ETH needed for investments. If minimum is not reached - contributors get their ETHs back. You can set it to 0 (no minimum).

START_DATE.LABEL: Start date
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Start date/time for opening the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted before that time

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: Finish date
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Finish date/time for closing the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted after that time.

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: Changing dates
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish Dates can be changed manually after Contract Deployment. You can prolong sale or finish it early.
Otherwise, dates are hardcoded and can`t be changed.

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: 最小和最大投资限制
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: 您可以指定可接受的最小/最大投资额/（{{currency||'ETH'}}）。 例如，接受0.05 {{currency||'ETH'}}至3000 {{currency||'ETH'}}区间的投资额

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Minimum
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Minimum amount accepted. "0" = No minimum limitation

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Maximum
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum amount accepted. it can not be higher hard cap

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Destination
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Set Destination for the investments. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: Destination address:
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: ETH address for sending all funds from the pool. It can be Contract address. Double check it before the submission.

BONUS.LABEL: Personal bonus (in Tokens) for the pool's owner:
BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-1%. % of pool's tokens (after successfull investment) will be sent to pool's owner.

HARD_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MAX
HARD_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MAX reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

SOFT_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MIN
SOFT_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MIN reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

PLATFORM_AS_ADMIN.LABEL: Control by MyWish:
PLATFORM_AS_ADMIN.DESCRIPTION:
ON is recommended - after sending the funds, you will be able to call the destination contract via MyWish.
If Off - only the owner of the contract can do it.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: 管理地址
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: 该地址的所有者将拥有该合约（唯一的）的管理权

RESERVE_ADDRESS.LABEL: 预留地址
RESERVE_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: 输入接收人的钱包地址
RESERVE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: 设定在管理地址丢失私钥的情况下要将资金发送到的备用地址

SHARE.LABEL: 分享
SHARE.DESCRIPTION: 您可以在多个储备账户之间划分资金，为每个预留地址选择配额百分比。

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: 用于接收通知的电子邮箱
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: 输入您希望接收加密货币转账通知的电子邮箱地址

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_DESCRIPTION: 输入合约的条件 – 设置转账日期。

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: 管理地址
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: ETH地址（不是交易地址）。 该地址将管理遗嘱合约。 仔细检查地址（及其访问权限）后再提交
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: 该地址将管理您的合约。 你可以使用Jaxx创建地址。仔细检查后再提交。

YOUR_EMAIL.LABEL: 用于接收余额信息和通知的电子邮箱
YOUR_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: 我们会提醒您确认"活跃"状态与合约的发送通知

BENEFICIARY_ADDR.LABEL: 受益人地址
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: 输入受益人的ETH地址。 合约执行后，资金将被发送到该地址。
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: 输入受益人的RSK地址。 合约执行后，资金将被发送到该地址。 继承人可以使用jaxx 创建地址.

BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.LABEL: 用于接收通知的电子邮箱
BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: 输入能接收转账通知的电子邮箱地址

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_TITLE: 设置"活跃"状态的确认频率

CONFIRMATION_EVERY.LABEL: 确认每个交易
CONFIRMATION_EVERY.DESCRIPTION: 您每次都需要从管理地址向合约发送交易。

CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.LABEL: 遗嘱合约到期
CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: 在截止日期之后，如果所有的确认信息都及时收到，所有资金将被发送到管理地址。

CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: 通过MyWish取消合约
CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: 在"开启"模式下，您将能在MyWish上一键点击取消合约并获得所有资金。

CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: 通过MyWish确认“活跃”状态
CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: 在"开启"模式下，您将能在MyWish上的一键点击确认“活跃”状态。

BOTH_VIA_MYWISH_TEXT.DESCRIPTION: 相较于开启模式，关闭模式更安全，但使用起来不方便。 您将需要安装Metamask来管理合约。 而在开启模式下您可以通过MyWish管理合约。

TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: The name of your token. 1-7 caps letters are accepted (like EOS, BTC, WAVES).
TOKEN_SYMBOL.ALREADY_NAME_TEXT: Token name is already in use

DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION: Define the decimals for your token. 0-15 are accepted. 4 as common.

TOKEN_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: EOS account (not an exchange account). This account will manage the token. Double check the account (and the access to it) before the submission.

DEFINE_TOKENS.DESCRIPTION: Define the amount of tokens which shall be minted to EOS address. It must be less (or equal) than (Maximum-Total) supply.

MAXIMUM_SUPPLY.LABEL: Maximum supply:
MAXIMUM_SUPPLY.DESCRIPTION: Total supply of the Token. No more tokens can be created.

TOKEN_NAME.LABEL: 代币名称：
TOKEN_NAME.DESCRIPTION: 输入项目名称，去掉空格，通常为5-25个符号，大小写均可

TOKEN_SYMBOL.LABEL: 代币符号：
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: 通常有3-4个字母，例如ETH，BTC，NEO，WISH等。请在提交之前检查它是否是唯一的(https://etherscan.com/tokens)
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_NEO: 该符号应该较短（建议使用3-8个字符），不得有空白字符或换行符，并应限制为大写拉丁字母（即英文中使用的26个字母）

DECIMALS.LABEL: 小数位数:
DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION: 定义代币的小数位数. 可接受0-{{max_decimals}}区间的位数。 {{default_decimals}}指惯例小数位数。

TOKEN_TYPE.LABEL: 选择代币类型
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: ERC-20是推荐项，被大多数交易所接受。
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: ERC-223与ERC-20几乎相同，代币转账安全性更高

TOKEN_OWNER.LABEL: 代币所有者
TOKEN_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: {{blockchain}} 地址(不是交易地址). 该地址将（在发售结束日期后）拥有代币的所有权。仔细检查地址（及其访问权限后）再提交。

RECIPIENT.TITLE: 设置代币地址（完成铸币后，代币将被发送到这个地址）
RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION_BLOCK: 您可以为团队预留代币也可以预留代币作为奖金与赏金– 这些代币将被创建，但在代币销售完成之前无法销售

RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: 地址
RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: 输入接收人的钱包地址

FUTURE_MINTING.LABEL: 未来铸币
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION:
是的 - 您可以在将来创建更多的代币并将其用于ICO
没有 - 将来不会再创建代币，也不会进行ICO
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION_NEO:
是的 - 您可以在将来创建更多的代币。
没有 - 将来不会再创建代币

CROWD_SALE.TITLE: ICO合约

BUTTONS.ADD_NEW_TIME_BONUS: 添加奖励：时间/已售代币
BUTTONS.ADD_OTHER_TIME_BONUS: 添加其他奖励：时间/已售代币

CAP_NOTE.TITLE: 注意！
CAP_NOTE.TEXT:
如果软封顶> 0，则所有投资都将存储在保险库合约中，直到ICO终止。
如果你需要立即在你的地址上投资，请设置软封顶 = 0。

CROWD_SALE.CHART_TOKEN_DISTRIBUTED_MESSAGE: 代币最大发行量，达到该数值时将不再铸币。

CHART_TEXTS.DATE: 已售代币发售日期/时间

CHOOSE_TOKEN.LABEL: 选择代币

ERRORS.CLOSED: 你不能使用这个代币。 最终发售已经完成
ERRORS.RUNNING: 在以前的销售完成之前，您不能使用此代币

CHOOSE_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: 如果你已经完成MyWish平台预售，选择创建新代币或选择现有代币
CHOOSE_TOKEN.DISTRIBUTED_DESCRIPTION: 显示您在预售期间已经发售了多少代币（包括团队、赏金和奖金的预留代币）

CROWD_SALE_TYPE.LABEL: 选择ICO类型
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: 您可以根据需要发起尽可能多的预售轮
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: 最终发售轮结束后将不再发售代币，结束日期后不能再创建代币

STORAGE_ADDRESS.LABEL: 投资存储地址
STORAGE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: ETH地址（不是交易地址）。 如果资金总额达到软上限，所有资金将在结束后发送到该地址。仔细检查后再输入地址

TOKEN_RATE.LABEL: 代币率
TOKEN_RATE.DESCRIPTION: 设置代币率，可接受，1-100000区间的数字 通常每一个{{blockchain}}500-5000个代币

HARD_CAP.LABEL: 代币硬封顶
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: 定义可以销售多少代币，达到该数值后，发售将自动停止，1-100,000,000,000,000区间的数字均可接受。

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: 代币软封顶
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: 定义为延续项目需要发售的最小代币数量，如果没有达到软封顶数值，投资者可撤回投资，项目一无所获。 您可以将其设置为0（无软封顶）

START_DATE.LABEL: 开始日期
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: 发售开始日期/时间，在此之前不接受任何投资

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: 完成日期
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: 完成日期/时间。在设定的时间之后不接受投资，， 达到硬封顶后可提前结束。

TRANSFERABLE.LABEL: 可转帐：
TRANSFERABLE.DESCRIPTION: 用户可以限制投资者的代币转账额直到代币发售完成，以减少投机行为。 建议关闭

AUTO_FINALIZE.LABEL: 自动完成：
AUTO_FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: 我们的系统可以在结束日期后自动完成合约（此后可进行代币转账）（如果达到硬封顶也可提前结束））

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: 更改日期
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION: 开始/结束日期可以在合约部署后手动更改。 您可以延长销售时间或提前完成销售。 否则，日期是硬编码的，不能更改。

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: 最小和最大投资限制
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: 您可以指定可接受的最小/最大投资额/（{{currency||'ETH'}}）。 例如，接受0.05 {{currency||'ETH'}}至3000 {{currency||'ETH'}}区间的投资额

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: 投资额下限
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: 可接受的最小金额。 "0 "=没有最低限制

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: 投资额上限
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: 可接受的最大金额，不得高于硬封顶

TIME_BONUS.LABEL: 奖金
TIME_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: 通常为0.1-100％，规定发送给投资者的额外代币量

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_TITLE: 请选择其中一个选项（或两者）激活奖金

DEPENDS_AMOUNT.LABEL: 取决于已售代币的数量：
DEPENDS_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: 规定在激活奖金前停用奖金时应发售的代币量

DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.LABEL: 取决于日期/时间：
DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: 规定每个人使用奖金的时间范围

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: 您可以根据代币发售数量和时间来设置奖金。 例如，为第一周的投资者提供额外的10％的奖金

AMOUNT_BONUS.LABEL: Bonus
AMOUNT_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: 通常为0.1-100％。规定发送给投资者的额外代币量。

MIN_AMOUNT.LABEL: 最小金额
MIN_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: 获得指定奖金的最小贡献额

MAX_AMOUNT.LABEL: 最大金额
MAX_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: 获得指定奖金的最大贡献额{{last ? ' (如果没有限制，您可以将其留空)' : ''}}

FIELDS.AMOUNT_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: 您可以根据贡献金额定义奖金额。 例如，为10个以上的ETH贡献者奖励额外的5％代币

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: 管理地址
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: 该地址的所有者将拥有该合约（唯一的）的管理权

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

EOS_WALLET.TITLE: Create EOS Account
EOS_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: By our service you can create EOS account. For EOS account creation you need to pay for RAM

ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Choose a name for your account
ACCOUNT_NAME.DESCRIPTION: The EOS account name is the main identifier it has to be unique. Contains letters and/or digits (1-5), and has 12 symbols.

HAVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Do you have a public key?

ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Enter your active public key
ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Please make sure that you have corresponding private key before filling. You can use https://get-scatter.com/ or our service for private/public pair generation.

OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Enter your owner public key
OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Please make sure that you have corresponding private key before filling. You can use https://get-scatter.com/ or our service for private/public pair generation.

GENERATED_ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Your active public key
GENERATED_ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: You Publiс Key will be available on MyWish anytime. But we recommend you to store the key on your PC or print it.

GENERATED_OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Your owner public key
GENERATED_OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: You Publiс Key will be available on MyWish anytime. But we recommend you to store the key on your PC or print it.

GENERATED_ACTIVE_PRIVATE_KEY.TITLE: Your active private key
GENERATED_ACTIVE_PRIVATE_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Copy and print your private key NOW. You CAN’T get it later. MyWish does not store private keys.

GENERATED_OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY.TITLE: Your owner private key
GENERATED_OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Copy and print your private key NOW. You CAN’T get it later. MyWish does not store private keys.

FIELDS.GENERATE_KEYS_DESCRIPTION:
We can generate public/private keys or you can use other services like https://get-scatter.com/.
MyWish is not storing the keys, it generates it only.

CAP_NOTE.TEXT:
If softcap > 0 all investments are stored on the crowdsale contract until the end of crowdsale or until soft cap is reached.
If you need to get investments right away set softcap = 0.

ADMIN_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Admin account:
ADMIN_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: EOS account (not an exchange account). This account will manage the Crowdsale. Double check the account (and the access to it) before the submission.

CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Crowdsale EOS account:
CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This EOS account shall be new. All contributors will be sent to contract under this account, the name should be connected with the project. For example, "mynewproject".

PROTECTED_MODE.LABEL: Withdraw before completion
PROTECTED_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Withdraw works only if soft cap reached. If On - the admin will be able to withdraw the contributions before making tokens transferable & sale completion. Off - no withdraw until tokens are not transferable.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account name:
ACCOUNT.AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the amount of tokens which shall be minted to EOS account.

MANAGEMENT_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Management account
MANAGEMENT_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this account will be able to manage the airdrop contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Token account
TOKEN_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify the token contract which you would like to distribute

SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: Enter the symbol of your token

ACCOUNTS_COUNT.LABEL: Number of accounts for distribution
ACCOUNTS_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify how many accounts will get your tokens. It can be 100 or even 50000 (max). Costs of the contract depends on the number.

PREVIEW.FREE_VERSION_MSG: 在免费版本（TestNet）中，源代码不可用于加载。
PREVIEW.DEFERRED_SOURCE_CODE: 您的延期付款合约的源代码
PREVIEW.INVESTMENT_POOL_SOURCE_CODE: Your Investment Pool contract source code
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT: 如果您需要验证Etherscan的合约，请与我们联系email
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT_OR_FOLLOW: 如果您需要验证Etherscan的合约，请与我们联系email or follow the instruction:
PREVIEW.LIBRARIES_AND_FILES: 可以找到库和其他文件here

VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_1: 打开合约地址etherscan
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_2: 在合约代码选项卡中选择"Verify And Publish "
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_7_1: 从构造函数参数字段ABI编码中删除参数
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_7_2: 输入构造函数参数ABI编码：
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_8: 其他字段不是必要信息。 点击"Verify And Publish"

CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_1:
在下一次检查之前，确认“活跃”状态：{{next_check|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}}

上一次“活跃性”确认：{{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_2:
资金已按照合约分配{{last_check ? (last_check|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}

上一次“活跃性”确认：{{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_3:
合约被取消，所有资金都被发送给合约的所有者。

上一次“活跃性”确认：{{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_4:
合约已到期，合约的所有者应提取资金。

上一次“活跃性”确认： {{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd') : '--'}}

TOKEN.EOS_TOKEN_INFO: To see the tokens and the distribution click on Token owner ({{token_owner_link}}) and choose "Action: issue" in "Other Actions" tab.

CROWD_SALE.CROWD_SALE_CONTRACT: ICO合约（所有贡献均应发送到此地址）
CROWD_SALE.VAULT_ADDRESS: 保险库合约（投资存储至代币预售结束）

AIRDROP.PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: After Contract deployment you will be able to add the list of the addresses for distribution.
AIRDROP.LOW_BALANCE:
Not enough tokens.
Please deposit the contract ({{require|separateNumber}} {{tokenSymbol}}) before the execution

SEND_TO_GROUP.TITLE: Send Tokens To
SEND_TO_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: The following addresses (#{{from}} - {{to}}) are included ti the next group for sending

INVESTMENTS_POOL.SHARE_LINK: You can share your contract to contributors by this link:
INVESTMENTS_POOL.SEN_FUNDS_TX: Sending transaction on Etherscan

EOS_CROWDSALE.CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT: Crowdsale EOS account (All contributions shall be sent to this address)

TEXTS.ITEM_1: This tool was developed for WISH token holders only.
TEXTS.ITEM_2: This tool helps WISH holders to specify EOS account for getting EOSISH.
TEXTS.ITEM_3: User should be able to make a transaction from ETH address.
TEXTS.ITEM_4: User can use tool until the 16-Jan-19 3 pm GMT.
TEXTS.ITEM_5: All transactions can be found in Ethereum blockchain, no cheats are possible.
TEXTS.ITEM_6: Tool is not responsible for sending EOSISH tokens.

INSTRUCTION.TITLE: Save EOS address
INSTRUCTION.DESCRIPTION: To connect your ETH address (which will have some WISH by Snapshot time) {{ethAddress}} to EOS Address “{{eosAddress}}” please do the following steps:
INSTRUCTION.ITEM_1: Send transaction (0 ETH) from your ETH address with WISHs:
